net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.prevayler
Interface Prevayler

All Known Implementing Classes:
SnapshotPrevayler
public interface Prevayler

Provides transparent persistence for all business objects in a PrevalentSystem. All commands to the system must be represented as objects implementing the Command interface and must be executed using Prevayler.executeCommand(Command). See the demo applications in org.prevayler.demos for examples.

Method Summary
 java.io.Serializable executeCommand(Command command)
          Logs the received command for crash or shutdown recovery and executes it on the underlying PrevalentSystem.
 PrevalentSystem system()
          Returns the underlying PrevalentSystem.
 

Method Detail

executeCommand

public java.io.Serializable executeCommand(Command command)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Logs the received command for crash or shutdown recovery and executes it on the underlying PrevalentSystem.
Returns:
The serializable object that was returned by the execution of command.
Throws:
IOException - if there is trouble writing the command to one of the log files.
java.lang.Exception - if the execution of command throws an Exception.

system

public PrevalentSystem system()
Returns the underlying PrevalentSystem.
